name: errn

body.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
-| wceq(crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[Er]c1 → ran(c0)= c1)
⊣ ran(c0)= dom(`' c0)
⊣ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(`' c0)= c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
-| wceq(crn(c0), cdm(ccnv(c0)))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[Er]c1 → ran(c0)= c1)
⊣ ran(c0)= dom(`' c0)
⊣ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(`' c0)= c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), c1))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(`' c0)= c1)
⊣ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(`' c0)= dom(c0))
⊣ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(c0)= c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0[Er]c1 → ran(c0)= c1)
⊣ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(`' c0)= dom(c0))
⊣ (c0[Er]c1 → dom(c0)= c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(ccnv(c0)), cdm(c0)))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(ccnv(c0), c0))

|- wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(crn(c0), c1))
-| wi(wer(c0, c1), wceq(cdm(c0), c1))

comment: The range and domain of an equivalence relation are equal. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 11-Oct-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
